hasDitaContent.@value: Erlotinib is predicted to increase the risk of gastrointestinal perforation when given with tiaprofenic acid. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Erlotinib   is predicted to   increase   the risk of gastrointestinal perforation when given with   tiaprofenic acid .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Tipranavir is predicted to increase the exposure to erlotinib. Manufacturer advises use with caution and adjust dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Tipranavir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   erlotinib .  Manufacturer advises use with caution and adjust dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: Erlotinib is predicted to increase the risk of gastrointestinal perforation when given with tolfenamic acid. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Erlotinib   is predicted to   increase   the risk of gastrointestinal perforation when given with   tolfenamic acid .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Erlotinib is predicted to increase the risk of gastrointestinal perforation when given with triamcinolone. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasDitaContent.@value: Vemurafenib are predicted to increases the exposure to erlotinib. Manufacturer advises monitor adverse effects and adjust dose.

hasDitaContent.@value: Erlotinib increases the anticoagulant effect of warfarin. Manufacturer advises monitor INR.
